# Update primitives page visuals and interactions (2025-12-08 00:33-0500)

_**User (2025-12-07 18:42-0500)**_

The primitives page callout still has the token flow backwards, it should go raw value, primitive, semantic like the other pages. The chips arent styles like the other pages either. Also any copy paste button should be next to the value its copying, like the vars. They also should not look like a checked box when clicked. It should have a brief tooltip pop up that says "Variable copied!". The line height visuals arent clear...1.5 looks just like 2...make a better visual represenation of those token types.

---

_**Agent (model claude-4.5-opus-high-thinking, mode Agent)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
The user is pointing out several issues with the primitives page:

1. Token flow is backwards - should go: raw value → primitive → semantic (not semantic → primitive → raw value)
2. Chips aren't styled like other pages
3. Copy buttons should be next to the value they're copying
4. Copy buttons shouldn't look like a checked box when clicked - should show a tooltip "Variable copied!"
5. Line height visuals aren't clear - 1.5 looks like 2, needs better visual representation

Let me read the current primitives page to understand what's there, and also look at other pages to see how they style things.</details></think>

---

Let me read the relevant files to understand the current state and see how other pages handle these elements.

=============================================================================\n// HELPER COMPONENTS\n// =============================================================================\n\nfunction CopyButton({ value, size = 'md' }: { value: string; size?: 'sm' | 'md' }) {\n  const [copied, setCopied] = useState(false);\n\n  const handleCopy = async () =&gt; {\n    try {\n      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(value);\n      setCopied(true);\n      setTimeout(() =&gt; setCopied(false), 2000);\n    } catch (err) {\n      console.error('Failed to copy:', err);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const iconSize = size === 'sm' ? 12 : 14;\n  const buttonSize = size === 'sm' ? 24 : 28;\n\n  return (\n    &lt;button\n      onClick={handleCopy}\n      title={&#96;Copy ${value}&#96;}\n      style={{\n        display: 'flex',\n        alignItems: 'center',\n        justifyContent: 'center',\n        width: buttonSize,\n        height: buttonSize,\n        borderRadius: 'var(--radius-md)',\n        border: '1px solid var(--color-card-border)',\n        backgroundColor: copied ? 'var(--color-success)' : 'var(--color-card)',\n        color: copied ? 'white' : 'var(--color-muted)',\n        cursor: 'pointer',\n        transition: 'all var(--duration-100) var(--ease-out)',\n        flexShrink: 0,\n      }}\n    &gt;\n      {copied ? &lt;Check size={iconSize} /&gt; : &lt;Copy size={iconSize} /&gt;}\n    &lt;/button&gt;\n  );\n}\n\nfunction ColorSwatchToken({ token }: { token: SemanticColorToken }) {\n  // Determine if color is light for text contrast\n  const isLightColor = (hex: string): boolean =&gt; {\n    const r = parseInt(hex.slice(1, 3), 16);\n    const g = parseInt(hex.slice(3, 5), 16);\n    const b = parseInt(hex.slice(5, 7), 16);\n    const luminance = (0.299 * r + 0.587 * g + 0.114 * b) / 255;\n    return luminance &gt; 0.5;\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div\n      className=\"color-swatch-token\"\n      style={{\n        backgroundColor: 'var(--color-card)',\n        border: '1px solid var(--color-card-border)',\n        borderRadius: 'var(--radius-lg)',\n        overflow: 'hidden',\n        transition: 'all var(--duration-150) var(--ease-out)',\n      }}\n    &gt;\n      {/* Color Preview - no buttons inside */}\n      &lt;div\n        style={{\n          height: 64,\n          backgroundColor: token.resolvedHex,\n          display: 'flex',\n          alignItems: 'flex-end',\n          padding: 'var(--spacing-2)',\n          borderBottom: token.resolvedHex === '#ffffff' ? '1px solid var(--color-card-border)' : 'none',\n        }}\n      &gt;\n        &lt;span\n          style={{\n            fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)',\n            fontFamily: 'ui-monospace, monospace',\n            color: isLightColor(token.resolvedHex) ? 'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)' : 'rgba(255,255,255,0.8)',\n          }}\n        &gt;\n          {token.resolvedHex.toUpperCase()}\n        &lt;/span&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n\n      {/* Token Info */}\n      &lt;div style={{ padding: 'var(--spacing-3)' }}&gt;\n        &lt;div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-2)' }}&gt;\n          &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)', fontWeight: 600, color: 'var(--color-foreground)' }}&gt;\n            {token.name}\n          &lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;CopyButton value={&#96;var(${token.cssVariable})&#96;} size=\"sm\" /&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n\n        {/* CSS Variable */}\n        &lt;div\n          style={{\n            fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)',\n            fontFamily: 'ui-monospace, monospace',\n            color: 'var(--color-muted)',\n            marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-3)',\n            wordBreak: 'break-all',\n          }}\n        &gt;\n          {token.cssVariable}\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n\n        {/* Reference Chain: Value → Primitive → Semantic */}\n        &lt;div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 'var(--spacing-1)', flexWrap: 'wrap' }}&gt;\n          {/* Raw Value */}\n          &lt;div\n            style={{\n              display: 'flex',\n              alignItems: 'center',\n              gap: 'var(--spacing-1)',\n              padding: '2px 6px',\n              backgroundColor: 'var(--color-background)',\n              border: '1px solid var(--color-border)',\n              borderRadius: 'var(--radius-md)',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)', fontFamily: 'ui-monospace, monospace', color: 'var(--color-foreground)' }}&gt;\n              {token.resolvedHex}\n            &lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;ArrowRight size={10} style={{ color: 'var(--color-muted)' }} /&gt;\n          {/* Primitive */}\n          &lt;div\n            style={{\n              display: 'flex',\n              alignItems: 'center',\n              gap: 'var(--spacing-1)',\n              padding: '2px 6px',\n              backgroundColor: '#3b82f610',\n              border: '1px solid #3b82f630',\n              borderRadius: 'var(--radius-md)',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)', fontFamily: 'ui-monospace, monospace', color: '#3b82f6', fontWeight: 500 }}&gt;\n              {token.reference}\n            &lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;ArrowRight size={10} style={{ color: 'var(--color-muted)' }} /&gt;\n          {/* Semantic */}\n          &lt;div\n            style={{\n              display: 'flex',\n              alignItems: 'center',\n              gap: 'var(--spacing-1)',\n              padding: '2px 6px',\n              backgroundColor: '#10b98110',\n              border: '1px solid #10b98130',\n              borderRadius: 'var(--radius-md)',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            &lt;Sparkles size={10} style={{ color: '#10b981' }} /&gt;\n            &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)', fontWeight: 500, color: '#10b981' }}&gt;\n              Semantic\n            &lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  );\n}\n\nfunction StatusIcon({ type }: { type: string }) {\n  switch (type) {\n    case 'Success':\n    case 'Success Light':\n      return &lt;CheckCircle size={16} style={{ color: '#22c55e' }} /&gt;;\n    case 'Warning':\n    case 'Warning Light':\n      return &lt;AlertCircle size={16} style={{ color: '#f59e0b' }} /&gt;;\n    case 'Error':\n    case 'Error Light':\n      return &lt;XCircle size={16} style={{ color: '#ef4444' }} /&gt;;\n    case 'Info':\n    case 'Info Light':\n      return &lt;Info size={16} style={{ color: '#3b82f6' }} /&gt;;\n    default:\n      return null;\n  }\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// MAIN COMPONENT\n// =============================================================================\n\nexport default function SemanticTokensPage() {\n  const [expandedGroups, setExpandedGroups] = useState&lt;Set&lt;string&gt;&gt;(new Set(SEMANTIC_COLORS.map(g =&gt; g.id)));\n\n  const toggleGroup = (id: string) =&gt; {\n    const newExpanded = new Set(expandedGroups);\n    if (newExpanded.has(id)) {\n      newExpanded.delete(id);\n    } else {\n      newExpanded.add(id);\n    }\n    setExpandedGroups(newExpanded);\n  };\n\n  // Count totals\n  const totalColorTokens = &lt;div style={{ maxWidth: 'var(--layout-6xl)' }}&gt;\n      {/* Header */}\n      &lt;div style={{ marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-8)' }}&gt;\n        {/* Breadcrumb */}\n        &lt;div style={{ ---

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
Now I can see the issues:

1. **Token flow backwards on primitives page** - Looking at lines 492-504, it shows:
   `--semantic-color-brand` → `--primitives-color-emerald-500` → `#10b981`
   
   This is semantic → primitive → raw value. But the user says it should be: raw value → primitive → semantic like other pages.
   
   Looking at the colors page (lines 454-512), it shows:
   `#34d399` → `Hash Emerald.400` → `Sparkles Semantic`
   
   So the colors page shows: raw value → primitive → semantic. The primitives page has it backwards!

2. **Chips aren't styled like other pages** - The primitives page (lines 493-503) uses simple spans without icons/colored backgrounds. The colors page (lines 456-512) uses chips with colored backgrounds and icons (Hash for primitive, Sparkles for semantic).

3. **Copy button should be next to the value** - Need to check how copy buttons are placed.

4. **Copy button looks like checked box when clicked** - The CopyButton changes to a green background with a checkmark, which looks like a checkbox. Should show a tooltip instead.

5. **Line height visuals aren't clear** - Looking at lines 196-238, the visualization uses lines inside boxes, but 1.5 and 2 would look nearly identical. Need a better visual.

Let me read the typography page too to see how line heights are shown elsewhere, and understand how to better visualize them.</details></think>

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
Now I have a good understanding of all the issues. Let me create a task list and fix them:

1. **Token flow backwards on primitives page** - The callout at lines 492-504 shows: semantic → primitive → raw value. It should be: raw value → primitive → semantic (like the colors page).

2. **Chips styling** - The primitives page callout uses plain spans without icons or colored borders. Should use styled chips like the colors page with Hash icon for primitives and Sparkles for semantic.

3. **Copy buttons** - Should be next to the value being copied, not standalone.

4. **Copy button visual feedback** - Currently turns green with checkmark (looks like checkbox). Should instead show a brief tooltip saying "Variable copied!" and keep the button appearance the same.

5. **Line height visuals** - The current visualization uses lines inside a box, but it's not clear. Need a better visualization that clearly shows the difference between line heights.

Let me fix these issues in the primitives page.</details></think>
